messages.message: Think this was brought up in a customer success feedback session at some point that we should remove T4's from our official list of supported GPUs given how slow they are. @shaunak I forget if there was any objection to that. And if not, @jean is this something you can help us update, I’m not sure if we just need to remove it from the infra requirements page (https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/infra-admin/dl-infra-requirements/index.html#gpu-requirements), or if we also need to call it out in the release notes.
